Package jkarel

Class WorldPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • jkarel.WorldPanel

  • public class WorldPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The WorldPanel is responsible for actually drawing the world, according to the specifications of the associated WorldBackend.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
